name: Pinch of Intelligence
body:
### Welcome to our website
We are a small company creating applications with artificial intelligence

### Support for the Reinforcement Teacher application
If you have problems with the Reinforcement Teacher application, please check: 
1. Are you on the BNAIC 2014? The app only works at this specific event
2. Are you connected to the correct wi-fi network?
3. Is the URL correct?

If one of these is not causing the problem, contact us in person!


### Contact
Our contact mail is pinchofintelligence@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
